entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workstation GC Performance #90555
  • [libs] Refactor `System.Dynamic.Utils.DelegateHelpers` to utilize `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #90548
    9.0.0
  • Createdump will incorrectly try to classify memfd entries as files #90547
  • IPV6 stack is required for .NET 6 and WSL #90543
  • Visual Basic late binding failure on COM objects #90541
  • Unify whether throw helpers are [StackTraceHidden] or not #90539
  • Incorrect alignment of reference struct within a struct on Mono #90531
  • Unhandled IOException failing superpmi-collect runtime tests on OS X arm64 Checked #90530
  • Unable to inject IKeyedServiceProvider into service with .NET 8 Preview 7 #90528
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests failing in CI runs #90521
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'hwintrinsicChild->isContained()' #90508
    8.0.0
  • Passing CancellationToken best practices #90507
  • RSA.ExportParameters(true) Throw CryptographicException on Redhat 7.9 #90506

Closed

  • Thread statics are no longer visible in debugger #89227
    8.0.0
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE in SslStream #37915
    Future
  • Test failure GC/API/NoGCRegion/Callback_Svr/Callback_Svr.sh #89701
    8.0.0
  • ObjectDisposedException intermittently crashes test process from DefaultHttpClientFactory.ExpiryTimer_Tick #90386
    8.0.0
  • DataContractSerializer caches collectible types in statics #77877
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] Android test failure: Failed to install mobile app #83422
    8.0.0
  • HasNativeCodeReJitAware #89475
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Many libraries tests failing due to `The type initializer for 'DynamicDelegateLightup' threw an exception` on tvos-arm64 #90494
    8.0.0
  • [Blazor] Custom ICU loading from runtime path #90018
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 developers can verify more APIs for correct usage to speed up their development #78442
    8.0.0
  • Remove redist entries from PlatformManifestFileEntry #66860
    8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Assertion failed in FormatHalf in Number.Formatting.cs in Linux musl #78361
    8.0.0
  • LoggerMessage source generator does not support Message Template Structure Capture Operator #90522
  • Should TimeProviderTaskExtensions run continuations synchronously? #85326
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ScopeValidation #89579
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilitiesBenchmark #89944
    8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] MAUI Android crashing the app and the debugger #78460
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing Dictionary by object key #76014
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] KeepNativeSymbols=true breaks SteppingTests.SkipWasmFunctionsAccordinglyJustMyCode #86387
    9.0.0
  • Methods that take a function pointer can't be reflection invoked #85028
    8.0.0
  • GlobalInstanceTrackerSupportTests_TargetUnix failing #86990
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Char> #89793
  • Receive 0x80070057 from load_assembly_and_get_function_pointer call when self hosting .NET 6. #90525
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 7/7/2023 5:58:29 PM #88673
  • Potential misunderstanding and misuses in Random.GetItems #88247
  • WPF app, IndexOfAnyValues to SearchValues change in .NET8 Preview5 breaking #88045
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Byte> #83825
  • Unable to run the wasi console template with UseArtifactsOutput=true #89744
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe shutdown and EventPipeEventDispatcher aren't coordinated properly #90472
    8.0.0
  • Deadlock on EventSource.EventListenersLock between EventPipeEventDispatcher.StopDispatchTask() and EventSource.Initialize() #86838
    8.0.0
  • Respect environment variables for disabling Vector support #84461
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add BinaryData.ContentType #87068
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImportAttribute incorrectly stating use of extension method and preventing compilation #90211
    8.0.0
  • .net 7.0 perf regression with stopwatch #90498
  • Brand dotnet/runtime to NET 8 #72112
    8.0.0
  • Remove dotnet7 feeds from NuGet.config when dependencies publish into dotnet8 feeds #63375
    8.0.0
  • Re-enable the subscription from dotnet/sdk --> dotnet/runtime when using a Preview 7 SDK in runtime #88675
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen on win-x86 #90219
    8.0.0
  • Add an analyzer that warns on single-use JsonSerializerOptions instances #65396
    8.0.0
  • Edit and Continue support in Linux #12409
    Future
  • NullReferenceException in GetHttp11ConnectionAsync #90317
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient does not try to look up SRV records when resolving DNS #90100
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add `mono-aot-cross --print-runtime-icall-table` to the cross compiler nuget #90366
    9.0.0
  • WebAssembly native dependency builds incrementalism is still slow #60245
    8.0.0
  • Evaluation of list + string. #66824
    9.0.0
  • ManagementDateTimeConverter.ToDateTime returns the wrong DateTimeKind #30128
    Future
  • Constant folding for `long->float` produces an incorrect result. #90323
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tests failing `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector128Tests.*` due to Specified type is not supported #88983
    8.0.0
  • Allocation for a simple isinst pattern in Tier0 #90492
    8.0.0
  • Runtime assemblies are not copied to output directory #90513
  • JsonNode.GetPropertyName/GetElementIndex exception message misleading #90474
    8.0.0
  • This is not a bug just a general dotnet aot build question #90511
  • Stop using select in the Mono debugger agent #82493
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable symbolicating traces in Release builds #81172
    8.0.0
  • [HttpClientFactory] UseSocketsHttpHandler API naming follow-up #89023
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Tests failing `Loader/classloader/InlineArray` on android-x64 #90384
    8.0.0
  • Could not find core Assembly in MetadataLoadContext #90009
    9.0.0
  • build error when only install professional vs2022 #90509
  • Inconsistency in Uri between macOS and Windows #90510

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add -skipcrossarchnative and -verbose options #90554
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Return false from ComWrappers.Try... methods #90553
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • [release/7.0-staging] Do not OCSP staple invalid OCSP responses #90552
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #90551
    area-System.Threading
  • Catch PNSE in TypeDescriptor #90550
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Reenable an assert on OSX #90549
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Extract general syntax generation code to SyntaxFactoryExtensions and use where possible #90545
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add a --path command line argument as an alternative to MONO_P… #90544
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Enable AddressSanitizer on Windows #90540
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasi] Update README.md for wasiconsole template #90538
    arch-wasm, area-Meta
  • Add doc for the new invoker classes #90536
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Added regression test 85765 #90534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono][WIP] Check if tests still crash #90533
    os-android
  • Fix GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte_Vector not taken on ARM64 #90527
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [GC] Use RegisterFrozenSegment for STRESS_REGIONS #90523
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Create top-level statements in store decomposition #90520
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Make `--skip-unresolved` the default when not running from SDK #90512
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Clean up AggressiveOpt tier in vm #90504
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Natvis visualization for threadstatic variables. #90473
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix VersionWithType Crossgen2 check for parameterized types #90501
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • support SslStream SSLKEYLOGFILE in debug builds #90429
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • HttpClientFactory prevent throwing if ILogger couldn't be created #90503
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Release setup #90529
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • improve handling of LLA in Quic #90455
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Rename GeneratedClearManagedSource to correct name #90537
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • DCS work nicely with collectible AssemblyLoadContext #90437
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • [libs][mono] Prevent static constructor from referencing `Internal.Runtime.Augments.DynamicDelegateAugments` in build scenarios without linking #90519
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Do not OCSP staple invalid OCSP responses #90200
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Blazor] Custom ICU loading from runtime path #90236
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Removed redist entries from PlatformManifestFileEntry #90542
    needs-area-label
  • Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #90049
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Use g_strcasecmp () to check whenever aot input assemblie… #90320
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][debugger]Adding more information about the array type #89304
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Make TimeProvider Delay Continuations Synchronously #90489
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [DependencyInjection] Use '==' instead of 'Equals()` to test service type equality #90334
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Update DNNE version #90524
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Revert "[mono] Update runtimeFlavor property for Mono AOT perf jobs" #90535
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support calling `get_Item` passing decimal, float or double as parameter. #90260
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Do not run the test with justMyCode enabled in debug mode. #90532
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Respect `AppendRuntimeIdentifierToOutputPath`, and `UseArtifactsOutput` #90365
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Using "RollForward": major for BrowserDebugHost #89962
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Using "RollForward": major for BrowserDebugHost #89003
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #90053
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Enable callconv and classloader runtime tests #90421
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Unspill normalize-on-load variables using exact small type #90318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix ilasm casting #90450
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Implement Edit and Continue on Linux and MacOS #90349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Use TCP transport for EventPipe on mobile platforms #90315
    area-Tracing-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Cache the output of `mono-aot-cross --print-icall-table` #90476
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Incremental build improvements #90194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger]Evaluate a sum between an object and a string #90175
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Switch DateTimeKind from Unspecified to Local #90149
    area-System.Management, community-contribution
  • Support invoke of function pointer type arg #90270
    area-System.Reflection
  • Ensure that constant folding for long->float is handled correctly #90325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix Vector<T>.IsSupported intrinsic #90023
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle side-effects in impBoxPatternMatch #90496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable InlineArrayValid and InlineArrayInvalid tests on Android #90414
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Resolve failing tests on apple mobile platforms #90515
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [MonoVM] Change how toggle refs are reported in gcdump #90467
    area-VM-meta-mono, os-ios, community-contribution
  • Improve error message in the new `JsonNode.GetElementIndex()` and `GetPropertyName()` methods. #90486
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Do not use `select(2)` on debugger-agent #90293
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Symbolicate function names on debug callstack #90348
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser
  • [DependencyInjection] Avoid useless reflection call in ActivatorUtilities #90378
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add NonGC documentation #90206
    needs-area-label
  • [QUIC] Merge 7.0 fix #90228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][arm64] Fixed passing/receiving hfa structures with fixed buffers. #90502
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Fix queue count in rate limiters #90409
    area-System.Threading
  • [7.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90343
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] [hot_reload] ignore modified MONO_TABLE_TYPEDEF rows in update #90172
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm] runtime: Fix creating the stack trace for a ManagedError #89905
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [6.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90344
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90446
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90456
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • gen0_bricks_cleared flag needs to be propagated when we change heap count #90457
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Integrate keyed DI with HttpClientFactory #90272
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Trim XmlSerializers codegen if unsupported #88796
    area-Serialization, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Remove AggressiveOpt from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef #90412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update to 22.04 queues #88619
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add check for tizen in ilc and crossgen2 #90310
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve debugging of HttpRequestOptions #90487
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Use popcount intrinsincs in BitOperations #85944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Typos #90396
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow handling on Unix #89799
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add a head merging pass #90468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Reduce number of gen 2 GC under high memory load #83328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • KeyAnalyzer tests. #90301
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Avoid extra `Array.Copy` in `List<T>.Insert(Range)` when the list is full #90089
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use non-generic `Memmove` for pointers in `String` #90383
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove a little work from CreateManifestAndDescriptors #90435
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
